IosPage.heading: Neurona App for IOS
IosPage.description: Detailed instructions on how to install the app on IOS

1.title: Open site
1.description: Open the Neurona.com website in the Safari browser

2.title: Click on the «Share» icon
2.description: Click on the «Share» icon (located on the bottom toolbar and is a rectangle with an upward pointing arrow)

3.title: Add to Home Screen
3.description: From the scrolling menu that appears, select «Add to Home Screen»

4.title: Enter a name
4.description: Enter a name for the shortcut, and then click «Add»

5.title: Done!
5.description: Once added, neurona.com will run as a web application on your home screen, offering a seamless full-screen experience without a browser address bar

GeneratorPage.heading: AI Image Generator
